I came to Dr Sangeetha Anand after trying to conceive for 4 months and not seeing any results. I was previously diagnosed with PCoD and had irregular cycles so we wanted to know if there were any underlying problems or concerns that we need to address soon.

On my first visit, Dr. Sangeetha took down all the details, my health history and family history as well. She explained the different reasons why natural conception may not occur and the possible treatments for each issue. She put me on a path to monitor my cycle first. She also recommended a semen analysis for my husband to rule out all possibilities for potential problems in conceiving. 

After one month of monitoring my cycle, ovulation induction and husband taking some oral medication prescribed by the doctor, we have now conceived. We did not expect this to happen so soon as doctor mentioned that probability is still low and may take a few months. 

She is realistic and straightforward in her approach. She patiently answers whatever queries one may have. She explains the medications and treatments that she is prescribing to the patients so we are aware of what we are doing.

After the positive home pregnancy test, when I met her again, she explained what will be the course of action, the medications I need to be on, risks with my pregnancy, etc. She also explained upto what point she can help with after which she will hand over to another gynec for the rest of the pregnancy.

We are very grateful to have found her and to have her expertise, help and guidance through this phase. I highly recommend Dr Sangeetha if you are having trouble conceiving.
